11/15/20
My parents and I decided to try a new place for dinner and we were absolutely blown away!! The service had to have been the best service I've ever gotten and ‚Ä¶More

name: L Mont
text: First time here and the pizza was pretty good. The service wasn‚Äôt bad either. The restaurant was really clean too.

name: Rusty McLouth
text: We had never been to Dewey's and were driving by and decided to stop on a whim. Such a great decision. The pizza was extremely good, the craft beer was very good, but the best part of the dining experience was the service. The general ‚Ä¶More

name: Dave Kitchens
text:
Dewey‚Äôs has probably my favorite pizza in town in the Don Corleone.

It has: RED SAUCE, MOZZARELLA, PEPPERONI, GENOA SALAMI, ‚Ä¶More

name: Julia Webster
text: Dewey's pizza is good. A little different from your normal pizza flavors. The ingredients are fresh & the combos are great. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim Holmberg
text: I ordered a pizza through Door Dash which is the exclusive delivery service for Dewey's Pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Tillman
text: My wife and tried Dewey‚Äôs Pizza for the first time last night! Great and delicious experience all around! ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff
text: Some of the best pizza in the city.  We first tried this pizza in Columbus, Ohio. We were excited when we saw that it was opening here..  Many great options of the menu.  Our favorite pizza is the Tito Santana.  It is a Mexican-style pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Cristina Yake
text: The pizzas here are top notch and very creative. Even better? Since covid, they have been very vigilant about their safety measures.

name: Doug Spencer
text: Really solid pizza. Nice place. We drove by it for months and wondered about it. Glad we checked it out. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joy Blincoe
text: This was the freshest EVERYTHING I've EVER had in a pizza! I mean the pizza was piled with your choice of ingredients and the crust was soooooo soft and fresh. The Peppercorn Ranch Salad ingredients were super fresh and you can add ‚Ä¶More

name: Michele Thomas
text:
First time ordering from Dewey‚Äôs Pizza, OMG!
BEST. PIZZA. EVER!!! Fresh ingredients. But it‚Äôs the flavors that knock it out of the park. I ordered a ‚Äúhalf Bronx Bomb/half Edgar Allen Poe‚Äù and both were absolutely delicious.

name: N A
text:
Pros:
1) Excellent pizza crust
2) Good topping variety ‚Ä¶More

name: Katrina
text: Hands down some of the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had, the crust is perfect.

name: Susan Diebolt
text:
The pizza and salads are fresh and delicious.
Dewey's is a safe social distance restaurant.

name: James Clingan
text: Very expensive.  Over $20 per pizza. Our friends rave about it but we just thought for the cost it should be better.  We've had better pizza at cheaper the cost.  The toppings were huge though... That was a plus

name: Anita King
text: Great food and great atmosphere, very clean! We went during happy hour and all 11" pizzas were half off, can't beat that!! Service was phenomenal, our waitress Kaari was very sweet and super helpful. Would absolutely recommend and we will be back!!

name: Kyle Yake
text: Got the Killer Veggie pizza (without cheese to be vegan) with a ton of red pepper flakes. Nothing to complain about.

name: Vitaliy Soyarkov
text: Our to go pizza place.  Best pizza in town!

name: Devon Rhodes
text: Last week was our first time we came to that restaurant. But It is definitely not the last time. We had a good time with the excellent service, with the high quality  dishes and booze and with the honest cost. We will absolutely go back there again.

name: David Deckert
text: This place really has a somewhat unique selection of pizzas and I have a difficult time in finding a flavor that I'm interested in trying.  That said, I always like what I order and I've come back several times.  It has a nice atmosphere, good service, and great Pizza once you make your choice.

name: Shaina Trujillo
text: Nice atmosphere!  The staff was very helpful and gave great service.  It's awesome that you can see the pizzas being made they the window!  I was a little disappointed initially that there was not any thing more than salad and pizza offered ‚Ä¶More

name: Jessie Mehl
text: What a great surprise. It was our first visit. The wait staff was friendly and attentive and the pizza was really good. Loved the crust. The atmosphere was nice; lots of families. Will definitely return.

name: Eric Argie
text: Very good pizza and salads! Good service.  Very clean.

name: Matthew Gergen
text: Hands down, my favorite pizza place around. Moved here from the St. Louis area about 5 years ago. When Dewey's came to the KC area I was ecstatic! Haven't found a better pizza in the KC metro. Staff is always friendly, restaurant is clean, and the kids love watching the kitchen staff prepare their pizza.

name: Brad Oxler
text: Great pizza place and surprisingly, the salads are even better than the pizza. Definitely recommend!

name: Rebecca Yang
text: Good pizza! Bronx Bomber was really good, although I feel it could have had more meat.

name: Matthew Bulicz
text: My trip to Dewey's was a five star experience, all around. The service and food were both extraordinary. ‚Ä¶More

name: Carolyn Phelps
text: Their gourmet pizza  was the best I've had, and the salad was fabulous, too!

name: Jamie Taylor
text: Because gluten-free pizza in Kansas! Best pizza I've had in Kansas gluten-free or not. I'll definitely be ordering again

name: Sue Fugitt
text: Loved the sauce and sausage very good pizza.

name: Kelly Korroch
text: Wow!  We ordered half Socrates Revenge & half Hawaiian and it was so delicious!! Five stars for sure...we will be back! Also the guys who waited on us were very friendly & professional.

name: Ken Lpz
text: Was Super busy when we ordered took a hour and fifteen minutes to get pizza but as ALWAYS way worth it .

name: Adam Ratliff
text: Terrible, tasteless, undercooked pizza. Might as well have grabbed a slice from the mall, would have been better and cheaper. First and last time with this chain.

name: JUDITH LEACH
text: We had the Figgy Pork, Specialty Meatball and Edgar Allan Poe.  Everyone of them was delicious!  Dough is hand tossed, tender, and sweet. We were warmly welcomed with 3 children in tow and they were entertained by the pizza maker behind the ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Barr
text: Excellent service and even better Pizza! #Pizza

name: Douglas Coffelt
text: Hands down, this is our favorite pizza place in the Kansas City area. The seasonal pizzas are always unique and delicious. They have the best calzones anywhere. The staff is excellent and friendly. We love it.

name: Bennett Souder
text: May have been the best pizza I've ever eaten. Can't wait to go again to make sure they just didn't get lucky. AWESOME!!

name: Armond Bechard
text: Best pizza in Jo Co!

name: Elle Eff
text: Amazing food and great atmosphere! The design is clean but not cold. It is very homey but not over done-if any of that makes since. We went for our first time last week and ordered the Bronx. We both ate (one salad and the largest pizza) ‚Ä¶More

name: Stephanie Anderson
text: My family ate here tonight for a birthday celebration and we had a great dinner. They were very accommodating for our party of eight, and the service was flawless. I enjoyed a salad with walnuts, gorgonzola, and a citrus vinaigrette, ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyler Wolf
text: I'm like Jordan, I just Dew it.  And when I say it, I mean Southwest BBQ, Porky Fig, Killer Veggie, or any other crowd pleaser they serve up.  Toss in a brew and I'm a happy boy.

name: Jayson Howell
text: Always dialed in...always delicious.  Never disappointed.

name: Ashlee Ghadyani
text:
Amazing crust! It had a nice crunch while still being fluffy. Plus, you can watch them hand toss the pizza while you wait.
The facility also looked way nicer than most pizza places I've been and our ‚Ä¶More

name: Lori Hudson
text: Nice staff. Great pizza! Cool atmosphere! Interesting pizza specials. Can't wait to try something different next time.

name: Chris Wallace
text: Got the Bronx Bomber. Fresh toppings. The crust was good. A little airy and crispy. I would like the bottom of the pizza to be a little crispier. Overall it was a good pizza. Not my 1st choice but would go back.

name: D K
text: Service was unacceptable. We will not return!

name: Jen Crabaugh
text: Never have I ever had a bad pizza here!  Check out the seasonal pizza and salad which changes every month or two.

name: Kim Marshall
text: Excellent experience. Great pizza and the best Ceaser salad. Great service and atmosphere.

name: KFSKC
text: You can order a small half cheese and half pepperoni and still give 5 stars. Google doesn't have enough stars to properly signify their specialty pizzas

name: Luis Jacas
text:
Tried this place in KC last weekend, so delicious and very friendly staff. This was the good ''restaurant experience'' that everyone wants when they go out.
I went back a few days later with the whole family, same experience, whole family loved it. Pizza was awesome, very good tasty dough too.

name: Noah PDK
text: My wife is a pizza connoisseur(not officially) but we eat pizza a couple days a week and out of all the places around KC & surrounding areas, Dewey's is her favorite. I'm not much of a pizza guy myself, I'm a taco freak but I will say, of ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimmie Chastain
text: pizza is delicious here. only thing i would suggest is pricing, important to stay reasonable for the customers.

name: Kate Thom
text: Great food, great service! The Inferno pizza is my favorite but you can‚Äôt go wrong with any of them! We order out and dine in often and they are always quick and super friendly!

name: Mary L Hohlfeld
text: Love this trendy, clean place. The kids enjoyed watching the cooks through the viewing window. They tossed the crust way up in the air and teased the kids by splashing flour at the glass. We had the meatball pizza ... delish!

name: Lauri Laughland
text: Excellent service from Gregg and delicious ingredients! Even the gluten free crust was the bomb. They made sure everything was perfect. We'll be back!

name: Paul Schmidtlein
text: Without a doubt a great Pizza place with outstanding food and and exceptional staff.   The  ambiance is very comfortable with great background music, comfortable tables and chairs and no annoying intrusive clatter  and  clanging which is ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandon Moore
text: By far the best pizza place in Kansas City. Absolutely phenomenal Pizza the crust is perfect a nice soft crunchy on the outside chewy and Airy on the inside. The sauce is phenomenal the cheese is high quality and the toppings are perfect. The only place to get pizza in KC

name: Schmuel
text: Calzones were excellent. Huge list of ingredients. Crust was flaky and chewy, not soggy or too crunchy. ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin S
text: Great food with interesting pizza options and amazing salads. Relatively quick food turnover and a unique shared waiter setup, so anyone can help out which is a nice touch.

name: Ryan Clement
text: Great pizza, good atmosphere, awesome place to spend time with family and friends!

name: Matt Weiss
text: Always good pizza and salads

name: Catherine Owings
text: Great pizza.  Wonderful service. Love the rotating specialty pizzas and seasonal salads

name: Michael Sesler
text: Very good pizza. Friendly staff. Not your typical pizza varieties, plus you can build your own. A little more expensive, but we felt the quality was worth it.

name: Chris Parish
text: Is it acceptable to lick a salad plate? Because that almost happened. My wife couldn‚Äôt stop with the salad. I can‚Äôt believe I‚Äôm just now finding out about this place. Amazing pizza! The toppings available are amazing and just about ‚Ä¶More

name: Jane Crampton
text: Delicious hand tossed gourmet pizzas and salads. We had 4 people and shared 2 large salads, Ceasar and Greek and 17" pizza that was half Don Corleone and half Fig. Salads are fresh. Pizzas dough is seen being hand tossed in exhibition ‚Ä¶More

name: Nick Jones
text: We really enjoy our visits to Dewey's Pizza. Their food is always very well prepared and presented, fresh and very tasty. This is a very fun place for small children, as they can watch the cooks making the magic happen in the kitchen behind ‚Ä¶More

name: Heaven Wilson
text: If I could give them 10 stars, I would. If I didn‚Äôt drive by them every so often, I would have never known they existed... however... They are, hands down, one of the best in KC. Great service, clean, and the pizza/salad never disappoints. üôåüèº

name: John Ford
text: Delicious!! Best PIZZA in KC. I am from CA and since moving to KC 3 years ago, I had been looking for a "go to" pizza place...this is the one. If there was a Dewey's pizza in as many places there are a Minsky's pizza, the town would be a better place. Hope more locations come soon but it is worth the drive.

name: Pamela Willis
text: When out of state family came to visit us here in KC, back in April, we did as much sightseeing as we could. With all the activity of that day came hunger. I turned to Yelp to help us discover places near Leawood, KS that we might enjoy ‚Ä¶More

name: Austin Lentz
text: Dewey's might be a little pricey comparatively but it is absolutely worth it. With a wide variety of high quality toppings you can normally always find a pizza that fits your mood. And though this may not be unique, for a pizza place ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew Doerr
text: Their Buffalo chicken pizza is the best! Have other great pizzas as well.

name: Dawn Smith
text: Pizza was great and service was even better. Kaari was our server and she was a rock star! Fresh ingredients.

name: James M
text: People love it I think its way over priced. ingredients are few and far between regarding the amount they put on  the pie

name: The Boleyns
text: Love the crust.   One of my favorite pizza places ever.

name: Pros and Khans
text: New favorite pizza place. My kids love watching them bake in the window,  there's usually a handful of children on the bench watching the pizza masters do their work... sometimes a little flour is playfully tossed at the window, much to the ‚Ä¶More

name: Shawn Bones
text: The food was delicious and we will definitely be back for more. The atmosphere was warm and inviting. The manager really went above and beyond when HE made the decision that our pizza didn‚Äôt have toppings spread evenly enough and made us a second, smaller one, for free.

name: Travis Stoner
text: Very friendly staff. Not afraid to make unique pizzas. Way better than most of the better known competitors in the city

name: Casey Conklin
text: Delicious food and great service!

name: Bill calvert

name: James Hill
text: Good service. You can just tell the ingredients were fresh.

name: Sean Cunningham
text: We live this place. The pizza is inventive and delicious. They have a really good beer selection. And they have a big window by the kitchen so the kids can watch the pizza being made.

name: Jeff Best
text: Good service. Unique pizzas. The crust is fantastic.

name: Bryant Miller
text: This is my idea of pizza. Fresh toppings,  a rich tomato sauce (I hear the white sauce is awesome too), and crispy yet nicely chewy crust. With smoked pine nuts or smoked cheddar cheese available you can create a really tasty customized pizza.

name: Jason Shar
text: It was really good. The inside is spacious, clean, and quite inviting. There's a good selection of beers, as well. ‚Ä¶More

name: Denise Smith
text: Great pizza. We get them well done.

text: Great pizza place. Fantastic pizza. Great service. ++ for date night.. Will be back soon.

name: Joann S

name: Scott Baltuska
text: Take my wife and kids once per week. Pizza is fresh and staff is awesome. Good beer selection as well- Bells Two Hearted Ale is delish. Love it here. (Don‚Äôt waste a pizza night at any other establishment- go Deweys- Love the Dr. Dre and seasonal salads!)

name: Charlene Biles

name: Michael Black
text: What a great place to have in the neighborhood! All the staff is very friendly and the pizza is always amazing! Keep up the good work!

name: Kevin Curtin
text: Its delicious. The kind of pizza that makes you literally go mmmmmhhh. Salads are good too! Cool ambiance.  Nice people. Beer taps.

name: Christian Hinton
text: This is a good, if pricey, pizza joint. The draft beer selection is well-chosen, though the ambiance and cost combine to keep it from being a must-have, go-to place.

name: Michelle Crews
text: A must-dine, must-try menu! I'm craving more just writing this review.  We love great pizza,  and the dough has a lot to do with making it great: well whatever is in their dough at Dewey's keeps me dreaming about more and more.... Their ‚Ä¶More

name: Danielle Yadon
text: Best pizza

text: Excellent food. Wonderful attentive wait staff.

name: Stephen Stevens
text: Dewey‚Äôs Pizza - super good, stop by a get you some of this!  Great pizza dough, excellent ingredients and super service.

name: Rebecca Winchell
text: First time diner while waiting for my car was being worked on next door. I forgot what great pizza tasted like and service as well. I will be back again!

name: Aaron Robben
text: Great food and very friendly staff.

name: Holly Giammanco
text: This place was fantastic. Really excellent crust on pizza; we got the Green Lantern. The seasonal salad has blueberries and Marconi almonds with a lemon vinaigrette and was really tasty and fresh. Their beer list is full of fun local brews. Overall a great dining experience!

name: Maya McVey
text: GOAT-worthy pizza!! Fluffy crust and multiple varieties!

name: Joan F Wagner
text: First time there. Family atmosphere. Great service. Barry was most attentive and helpful. Will be going back.

name: Chris Schaberg
text: Great food great service I will be back thank you!!

name: Nick Stone
text: 3 stars since I went for an order pick up and not as a party. Cool idea to have a round bar in the middle of the room. Pizza was ok, Abit overpriced, but that's typical for anything not Domino's, pizza hut, or papa John's. Abit difficult to ‚Ä¶More

name: R H
text: Love the salads, pizza is way better then the big food chain ones

name: Ajay Philip
text: A beautiful restaurant with some amazing staff. Only downside is my pizza was a bit salty to my liking, but it tasted great otherwise. Tried the Don Corleone.

name: Shelly Kramer
text: It's hard to find fault with the pizza at Dewey's, it truly is fantastic. Their salads are equally amazing and the service is good as well. That's not why I felt Dewey's earned a two-star rating. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Huffhines
text: Ordered three pizzas for take-out.  Friendly staff; delicious pizza.

name: Alley Stonestreet
text: It was really good! A friend recommended this from his time in St Louis and he was so so right. The Porky Fig was fantastic! Their seasonal pizza was excellent. Definitely will go back for more. Yum!!

text: Pizza was good. Surprised they did not have spatulas to serve the pizza with.

name: Rachel Gilmore
text: Would highly recommend this pizza place to eat!! We had the Socrates and Green Lantern and the Green Lantern was fabulous! Good service and knowledgeable staff (coming from previous waitress and retail) on recommendations and general menu. Very polite!

text: Service  was a little slow, food was great

text: Excellent service by Heidi and Sterling. Team effort. Food was amazing. Will definitely return. Light crispy crust was something  never before experienced.

text: good food and service.

text: We had the green lantern pizza and it was delicious. The staff was really friendly and the place had a cool atmosphere. We will definitely be back.

name: serena Smith
text: If I could eat here all my life...and even after I die.. I would. Me and my daughter eat here at least twice a month.

Great pizza, cozy place, and fantastic customer service. Highly recommended.

text: I love Dewey's!! I first went there in Cincinnati, and was excited when I found out they opened one in KC! Can't go wrong, all the pizzas are great!

text: Amazing
